name: MetaRay Type 6
description:
Can you survive 10 seconds of bullet hell?

Each level is about 10 seconds long, you got 3 lives,  3 sub weapons and 1 smart bomb from 3 different types of ships.

This is a demo and the 6ths version of MetaRay.

Controls

Move – WASD / Arrow keys / D-pad / Joystick

Shoot – Space / X / A

Smart Bomb – Shift / B / Z

Sub Weapon – E / C / Y

Paus – Esc / Start
